sentences.en: A double trapezoidal specimen will generate shear debonding.
sentences.cn: 双梯形的试样将产生切变脱胶现象.

sentences.en: A fluid cannot withstand a shear.
Again we call the faster wave the longitudinal and the slower wave the shear shock wave.
sentences.cn: 我们还是把较快的波叫做纵冲击波,而把较慢的波叫做剪切冲击波.
所有的切应力都必须等于零.

sentences.en: Competitors have six minutes to shear four sheep.
sentences.cn: 参赛者们有6分钟的时间来给4只羊剪毛。

sentences.en: Every spring they shear off the sheep's wool and sell it.
sentences.cn: 每年春天他们都要剪下羊毛去卖.

sentences.en: Extensive through - thickness shear causes crack - tip necking.
sentences.cn: 大范围的穿透厚度剪切引裂纹顶端的颈缩.

sentences.en: Her long fair hair had been shorn.
sentences.cn: 她长长的金发已经剪掉了。

sentences.en: In developing equations for maximum shear stresses, the special case will be considered.
sentences.cn: 在导出最大剪应力表达式时, 将考虑一种特殊情况.

sentences.en: In fluids, forces of tension and shear can often be ignored.
sentences.cn: 在流体中, 张力和切力通常可以忽略不计.

sentences.en: Normally the shear velocity is about half of the compressional velocity.
sentences.cn: 一般地说横波速度大约是纵波速度的一半.

sentences.en: Shear force is implicit in the development of bending moments.
sentences.cn: 杆中的剪力在弯矩的推导中是不明显的.

sentences.en: The interfacial shear stress is a constant proportion of the bottom shear.
sentences.cn: 交界面的剪力与底部剪力之比是常数.

sentences.en: The pumps must be of the low shear Archimedes screw type.
sentences.cn: 泵必须是低剪切力的阿基米德螺旋式泵.

sentences.en: The shear strain can be determined in the following way.
sentences.cn: 用下列方法能够确定切应变.

sentences.en: The shear strenth is equal to the cohesion of substance.
sentences.cn: 剪切强度等于物质的内聚力.

sentences.en: Though shorn of some of its powers, the party remains in control.
sentences.cn: 虽然被削去了一些权力，该党仍然掌握着控制权。
用大剪刀修剪这些灌木。

sentences.en: Without loss of generality, shear deformations will be neglected.
sentences.cn: 不失一般性, 忽略不计剪切变形.

words.tran_cn: 剪羊毛（shear的现在分词）；修剪

phrases.tran_cn: 剪切破坏；剪破裂；剪切断裂
剪切模量；剪切弹性模数
[流体力学]剪切阻力；剪切强度
剪力墙；抗震墙，耐震壁；风力墙

trans.tran_en: A pair of shears is a garden tool like a very large pair of scissors. Shears are used especially for cutting hedges.
to cut the wool off a sheep
to cut the wool off a sheep
